tool_description: Integrates meeting information with various calendar systems and synchronizes meeting details across platforms.

calendar_system.description: Target calendar system (outlook, google, apple, exchange)

meeting_details.description: JSON string containing complete meeting information

sync_attendees.description: Whether to sync with attendee calendars

update_existing.description: Whether to update existing calendar entries

error_messages: Unsupported calendar system: calendar_system must be one of outlook, google, apple, exchange.
Invalid meeting details: meeting_details must be valid JSON format.
Calendar authentication failed: Unable to authenticate with specified calendar system.
Sync failed: Unable to synchronize meeting with one or more attendee calendars.
usage: Specify target calendar system and meeting details in JSON format. Optional settings for attendee sync and updating existing entries. Returns calendar integration status.

integration_status.description: Status of calendar integration (success, partial, failed)

calendar_event_id.description: Unique event identifier in the calendar system
